title: Crime Alert: Retail theft suspect sought in Exeter Township
text:
Crime Alert Berks County, a citizen crime-fighting group, is offering cash rewards of up to $10,000 to anyone supplying tips that lead to an arrest in this case or any other case or crime.
Tipsters with crime information can call 877-373-9913 anytime or contact Crime Alert at its website at www.alertberks.org or via the AlertBerks smartphone app. No one will ask the name of the caller, who will be assigned a code number.
Unsolved cases are featured regularly in the Sunday Reading Eagle .
Exeter Township police are asking for the public’s assistance in identifying this individual suspected of involvement in a theft from the Target store on Perkiomen Avenue on Aug. 10. (Courtesy of Crime Alert Berks County) Offense: Retail theft
Date: Aug. 10
Location: Target, 4599 Perkiomen Ave., Exeter Township
Police synopsis: Exeter Township police are asking for the public’s assistance in identifying the pictured individual. They said the subject and another male (who has been identified) were involved in a theft of more than $200 worth of merchandise from Target. The pictured male left the lot in a black Chevrolet Malibu. Anyone with information pertaining to this incident or can identify the suspect is asked to contact Crime Alert via the above methods or Exeter police directly at 610-779-1490 and reference case #25-24-11828.
